ChiMu  Documentation  API Form descriptionTree Index

Interface com.chimu.form.description.ColumnDescription

public interface ColumnDescription
extends Serializable
A ColumnDescription hold onto all the information needed to create a FORM Database Column. This is divided into two types of information:
  1. User controllable information like the Java type that the column represents,
  2. Database specific information which is retrieved from the database

    Variable Index

    o BASIC_COLUMN
    o COMPOUND_COLUMN

    Methods

    createColumnFor_inDb 
     public abstract Column createColumnFor_inDb(Table table,
                                             DatabaseConnection dbConnection)

    createColumnFor_inDb_noColumnInfo 
     public abstract Column createColumnFor_inDb_noColumnInfo(Table table,
                                                          DatabaseConnection dbConnection)
    Create a column from this description but do not put any of the database column information (i.e. cached database information) into the column.
